file.name: non-oauth-scopes.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
info:
  title: Non-oAuth Scopes example
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /users:
    get:
      security:
        - bearerAuth:
            - 'read:users'
            - 'public'
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: jwt
      description: 'note: non-oauth scopes are not defined at the securityScheme level'
